summary: This is an automated email notification from the USAfx File Exchange system (Box.com) indicating that a collaborator was invited to a folder named 'Epstein Death' on January 22, 2020. The notification was sent to a US Department of Justice email address.

events.title: Collaborator invited to 'Epstein Death' folder
events.description: An automated notification from the USAfx File Exchange system (Box.com) indicates that a collaborator was invited to a folder named 'Epstein Death'.

locations.address: 900 E Berson Avenue, Redwood City, CA
locations.context: Address listed in the email footer, likely a Box.com corporate address.

keyFacts: A folder named 'Epstein Death' existed within the US Department of Justice's USAfx File Exchange system (Box.com).
On January 22, 2020, a collaborator was invited to access the 'Epstein Death' folder.
The notification was sent to a US Department of Justice email address (usdoj.gov@esfs.us), indicating official use of the system.
The document is an automated system notification, not a substantive case file.
